title: The Green Flash and Other Tales of Horror, Suspense, and Fantasy
description: A collections of suspenseful short stories from Joan Aiken, Mrs. Considine / Marmalade Wine / Sonata for Harp and Bicycle / The Dreamers / Follow My Fancy / Smell / Searching for Summer / A View of the Heath / Belle of the Ball / Summer By the Sea / Minette / Dead Language Master / The Windshield Weepers / The Green Flash.
author: Joan Aiken
